directions: Combine the cucumbers, onion, serrano pepper, lime juice, and salt in a large bowl. Add the pineapple and avocado. Gently toss to combine.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and cubed
2 1/2 cups pineapple, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch dice
title: Avocado Pineapple Salad
